item.description:
***** 12/29 update: Last night I sent Stan's address and contact number out to the people who RSVPed YES or MAYBE. I'll send the info out one more time at about 5 pm on Tuesday for any new people who have responded so please be sure to RSVP by then. See you there!! *****


Looking for festivities between the holidays and New Year's Eve? Look no further...you are invited to Stan's place for a post-Christmas/Chanukah, pre-New Years party!

When?
Tuesday December 30th @ 7 pm

Where?
Stan's place in Madison, Connecticut. The address and contact information will be sent to people who sign up as a "YES" or "MAYBE" a few days before the event.

What to bring?
-A light snack or drinks
-An ornament for the tree. Please bring an ornament with "personality." They can be homemade, unusual, silly, whatever you want as long as they are not plain old round ornaments. There should be lots of sales if you wait to get it until after Christmas.
item.name: Post-Holiday, Pre-New Years Party 12/30 @ 7 pm
